Mount Alvernia Hospital is part of the BMI group of hospitals that specialise in the highest quality of private healthcare, with 59 hospitals nationwide and more than 85 years of experience. Mount Alvernia provides facilities for advanced, cutting-edge surgical procedures together with friendly, professional care. Located close to Guildford town centre, Mount Alvernia Hospital is a 12-minute taxi ride from Guildford train station. It is also convenient access from both Gatwick airport and Heathrow airport.
